Pakistan bomb blast kills five polio vaccination guard policeA bomb blast in northwest Pakistan near the Afghan border killed five police on polio vaccination guard duty and wounded more than 20 on Monday, the latest in a series of attacks by Islamist militants ahead of the Feb. 8 national elections. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 09:36:54 GMT 7CHCPRWEBJLGJLB7SDHI54P7Q4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-bomb-blast-kills- Five-polio-vaccination-guard-police-2024-01-08/Mushtaq Ali世界亚太地区
Cyprus replaces defence, health, justice, farm ministers in reshuffleCypriot President Nikos Christodoulides axed his health, justice, defence and agriculture ministers on Monday in a widely expected reshuffle almost a year into his term. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 09:30:22 GMT 2H7Q5K2EXJJ6XGLBDNASPQJZ54 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/cyprus-replaces-defence-health-justice-farm-ministers-reshuffle-2024-01-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Iran seeks quick resolution of issues preventing Umrah pilgrimageIran hopes technical problems preventing Iranian Muslims from making the Umrah pilgrimage in Saudi Arabia will soon be resolved, Foreign Ministry spokesperson Nasser Kanaani said on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 09:26:22 GMT QJZRQRESGVJ33P4DI7TVKIML7A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-seeks-quick-resolution-issues-preventing-umrah-pilgrimage-2024-01-08/Reuters世界中东
Blinken meets Arab leaders in diplomatic push over Gaza warU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken was holding more talks with Arab leaders on Monday as part of a diplomatic push to stop the war in Gaza spreading further. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 09:20:48 GMT TEEGW67GZNPS7FNCMIFRMYQB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/blinken-meets-arab-leaders-diplomatic-push-over-gaza-war-2024-01-08/Simon Lewis世界
WHO axes medical aid delivery to north Gaza in absence of security guaranteesThe World Health Organization (WHO) said it had been compelled to cancel a mission to bring medical supplies to northern Gaza on Sunday after failing to receive security guarantees. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 09:02:32 GMT 4GM732L2HVNCXPKI66HHQF5NNA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/who-cancels-delivery-medical-supplies-north-gaza-due-unsafe-conditions-2024-01-08/Reuters世界中东
Japan quake survivors, without power or water, seek news on rebuild plansA week after a major earthquake struck the west coast of Japan, thousands of people are still without water and electricity and have yet to be told when plans to rebuild can begin. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 08:42:30 GMT KG5UECRG4BPLDO7ZNO6KRBBJDM https://www.reuters.com/world/japan/japan-quake-survivors-without-power-or-water-seek-news-rebuild-plans-2024-01-08/Chris Gallagher, Joseph Campbell世界亚太地区
North Korea's Kim Jong Un turns 40. Maybe.North Korean leader Kim Jong Un is believed to have turned the big four-oh on Monday, but state media continued its decades of silence on his birthday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 08:40:24 GMT YB4JPJFQARNJPDNOSMLVVITWMNY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-koreas-kim-jong-un-turns-40-maybe-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
China to conduct live firing drills in East China Sea on Jan 8-9China will conduct live firing drills in some areas in the East China Sea from 10 a.m. (0200 GMT) to 3 p.m. on Monday and Tuesday, according to the China maritime safety administration. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 08:35:45 GMT 7Y4A4TFDVZPYTCIHT5JKXBW6HQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-conduct-live-firing-drills-east-china-sea-jan-8-9-2024-01-08/Reuters世界中国
Bangladesh PM Hasina: From champion of democracy to iron ladyBangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina once joined rivals in a fight to restore democracy but her long reign in power has been marked by arrests of opposition leaders, crackdowns on free speech and suppression of dissent. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 08:31:00 GMT JHNWFDNJHRNFHLJKYZBVO2JASM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladesh-pm-hasina-champion-democracy-iron-lady-2024-01-08/Sudipto Ganguly, Ruma Paul世界亚太地区
India-Maldives row escalates, agency suspends flight bookings to islandsOne of India's largest travel platforms suspended flight bookings to the tourism-dependent Maldives on Monday after disparaging social media posts against Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi embittered relations between the South Asian neighbours. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 08:27:24 GMT QP6ZE622ZRPO3B3LRZBDAHQ3D4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/india-maldives-row-escalates-agency-suspends-flight-bookings-islands-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
Two killed in Russian air strike on UkraineRussia fired missiles across Ukraine early on Monday in its latest mass air strike, killing at least two civilians and hitting residential areas and commercial sites, Ukrainian authorities said. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 06:43:24 GMT SE2L5WZKFZLD3FNEGMWBCZBXOY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-launches-missile-attacks-across-country-say-ukrainian-officials-2024-01-08/Dan Peleschuk, Pavel Polityuk世界欧洲
